data.about: The Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering aims to provide strong academic and research foundations to students in computing. The department offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs with a focus on innovation, collaboration, and technical excellence.

message_from_hod.name: Dr. A. Kumar
message_from_hod.message: Welcome to the Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering. Our department strives to empower students with the knowledge, skills, and confidence to excel in a dynamic and fast-evolving tech world. We promote research and industry partnerships to ensure our students are future-ready.

faculty_members.name: Dr. G. Devasena
faculty_members.designation: Assistant Professor , Head of the Department

research_areas: Cloud Computing and Big Data Analytics

lab_facilities.description: Our department has state-of-the-art labs for students and researchers including AI Labs, Networking Labs, and IoT Labs.
